title: China’s Price War Puts Alibaba Under Spotlight Before Earnings
description: An intense price war in China’s food delivery sector is dealing more damage than expected to the country’s e-commerce giants, forcing analysts and investors to slash their share price targets.

title: Chinese AI Chip Firm Cambricon Dives 9% After Warning of Risks
description: AI chip designer Cambricon Technologies Corp. plunged almost 9% after warning investors about a doubling in its share price over just a month, a record gain that helped fuel a $1 trillion Chinese market rally.

title: Super Micro Filing Raises Concerns About Financial Controls
description: Super Micro Computer Inc. cautioned that weaknesses in its controls related to financial disclosures could, if not fixed, hurt the company’s ability to report results “in a timely and accurate manner.”
